Text:
Been a fan of this show for near 15 yrs ,but its gone down hill alot in last few Paul merton has a fw moments still but hislop is pointless now completely & the guest hosts R rubbish ,Jermey clarkson not funny or even able to pick the media agenda apart
Anne widicombe was the best they had & they made sure she never came bk as she took them apart
Dish the show or new team captains
